title: Make Publisher dropdowns scrollable and constrained within modals (max height 250px)

requirements.summary: Constrain the Publisher Select dropdown lists in the four specified modals to a max height of 250px with vertical scrolling and collision-aware positioning so they remain visually contained within the modal/viewport, without changing any other behavior or text.
acceptanceCriteria: In each of the four specified modals, the Publisher dropdown list has a maximum height of 250px.
When the Publisher list exceeds 250px in height, the dropdown list becomes vertically scrollable and a scrollbar is available.
When opened near the bottom/top of the modal/viewport, the dropdown list repositions and/or constrains itself so it does not render off-screen and does not visually escape the modal experience.
No other fields, dropdowns (e.g., service year, status), form validation, submission behavior, or user-facing text is changed.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the Publisher Select dropdown usage to make the list scrollable with max height 250px (e.g., applying max-height and overflow-y styles to SelectContent) and enable collision-aware/contained rendering within the modal/viewport using supported SelectContent positioning props. Use the existing shadcn-ui Select/SelectContent components (do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update ONLY the Publisher Select dropdown usage to enforce max height 250px with vertical scrolling on the SelectContent, and ensure the dropdown is constrained/repositioned to remain within the modal/viewport when opened near edges (using supported SelectContent positioning/collision props). Keep all other styling, validation, and text unchanged. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update ONLY the Publisher Select dropdown usage (not Status or other controls) so SelectContent has max height 250px with overflow-y scrolling and remains contained within the modal/viewport via supported positioning/collision settings. Preserve all existing behavior, validation, and text. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update ONLY the Publisher Select dropdown usage to apply a 250px max height with vertical scrolling to SelectContent and ensure the dropdown stays within the modal/viewport using supported collision-aware positioning options. Keep all other behavior, styling, and text unchanged. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
